sections.title: General Terms

Using the site implies full and unconditional acceptance of these Terms. If you disagree with the Terms, cease using the website.
The site allows registered users ("Users") to keep track of information about their vehicles in the "Service" section.

The Administrator reserves the right to modify these Terms. The updated version of the Terms will be published on the website with the date and time of the last update. Users are encouraged to regularly review this page for any changes. Continued use of the website after changes are published means acceptance of the updated Terms.

sections.title: Registration
content: To access the site's features, you must register by filling out the following fields:

list: First name
Last name
Email address
Password

content: The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials.
Passwords are encrypted before being stored on the server to ensure data security.
If unauthorized access to an account is detected, the user must immediately notify the Administrator.
By registering, the user confirms they are at least 18 years old.

content: "Administrator" — the entity responsible for managing the website.
"User" — the individual who registers on the site and uses its features.

sections.title: Payment and Refund Policy
content: The website does not accept payments for premium plans, as they are demonstration-only.
All premium plans are marked as "inactive" and cannot be purchased.

sections.title: Tariff Plans and Limitations
content: The website offers three tariff plans:

list: Free: allows creating entries for only one vehicle.
Family (demonstration): allows creating entries for up to 5 vehicles.
Business (demonstration): allows creating entries for an unlimited number of vehicles.

content: All premium plans are marked as "inactive" and are unavailable for purchase.

sections.title: Website Usage
content: The user agrees to provide accurate information during registration. Since the website is a demonstration project, data is not processed for purposes other than profile creation. The Administration has access only to the email address for managing plans and other administrative needs. Other user data may be accessed by the Administration in case of technical issues to ensure the website’s functionality or to fix errors, but it will not be used for other purposes.
After registration, the user can add information about their vehicles in the 'Service' section. This data may include:

list: Vehicle make and model;
VIN code, HIN code, serial number;
Color, year of manufacture, engine capacity, fuel type;
Mileage, repair and maintenance history;
Other notes related to the vehicle.
content.nextPartText: This data is stored in the website database and is accessible only to the user. The Administration does not use this data except for technical maintenance.
